column.name: search_type
column.text: 生成代码时是否作为查询条件

column.name: oro_column_type
column.text: ORMapping映射的字段类型：gid=全局唯一码 updateTime=更新时间 createTime=创建时间

column.name: column_codegen_type
column.text: 字段的代码生成器类型 1=选择器 2=字典 3=外键 4=text 5=long 6=double 7=date 8=file

column.name: column_codegen_format
column.text: 默认：double型的为两个小数点， date 为'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'

statements.statement:
select A.* from sys_column A where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> and ( A.id like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.db_name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.table_name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.comment like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.remark like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' ) </#if> <#if query.id??> and A.id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.version??> and A.version = '${query.version}' </#if>
<#if query.dbName??> and A.db_name = '${query.dbName}' </#if>
<#if query.tableId??> and A.table_id = '${query.tableId}' </#if>
<#if query.tableName??> and A.table_name = '${query.tableName}' </#if>
<#if query.name??> and A.name = '${query.name}' </#if>
<#if query.comment??> and A.comment = '${query.comment}' </#if>
<#if query.remark??> and A.remark like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.remark)}%' </#if> <#if query.appCode??> and A.app_code like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.appCode)}%' </#if>
<#if query.sortField?? && query.sortOrder??> order by ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortField)} ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortOrder)} <#else> order by sn </#if> </#if>

SELECT A.TABLE_NAME table_name, A.COLUMN_NAME name, A.COLUMN_COMMENT comment, A.DATA_TYPE db_type, CAST((CASE WHEN A.COLUMN_KEY = 'PRI' then 1 else 0 END) as SIGNED) as primary_key, CAST(A.ORDINAL_POSITION as SIGNED) sn FROM information_schema.columns A WHERE 1 = 1 and table_schema = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(args[0])}' and table_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(args[1])}'
